src.pages.HomePage.cloud1Content: Is no longer a distant concept - its effects are felt worldwide.
src.pages.HomePage.cloud2Content: One of the most pressing issues is the water shortage, affecting millions of people.
src.pages.HomePage.cloud3Content: Satellites allow us to monitor the state of our planet in real-time. Through them, we can identify areas most at risk of drought.
src.pages.HomePage.cloud4Content: Is our most important weapon against climate change. Learn more to grasp the magnitude of the issue.
